description:
Even if you are living in the present, hell will still be waiting to drag you back to your worst nightmare in the year 1983.

This game was developed from Jan 30 to Feb 4 2022 by me. I still lack a lot in this game but i just want to release the demo to find out what people will say about my work.

This game was created using analepsis, and it is about the murder of the father that was not peacefully justified, as well as the character who is experiencing strange feelings when he enters the house where the father died.
